entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rockglen 09:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -34

Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
